description: half length portrait of artist facing right and looking out at viewer; wearing cloak and ruff with glove in left hand; pillar behind; ledge with palette and brushes at right
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: MICHAEL MIREVELT / ICONUM PICTOR IN HOLLANDIA / Ant. van Dyck pinxit / Wilhelm Iac. Delphius sculpsit   cum priulegio | on sheet in pencil: 2-74
title: Portrait of Michael Mirevelt
